Text saved: "Fast fashion" means clothes are popular for a short time. They are not popular quickly.

Maybe people do not know they cause a clothes problem. They give their old clothes to charity shops. But charity shops cannot sell all these clothes. "Fast fashion" clothes are often bad quality. So, people cannot use them again. People do not want to buy them used. Many clothes are thrown away. Charity shops send many clothes they cannot sell to other countries. This makes more money problems. It also makes more world problems.
